text: Uye zvichienderana nemaonero avo, vanoti: “Mhuka idzi nezvirimwa izvi hazvibvumirwi, uye hakuna anodya kubva kwazviri kunze kweavo vatinobvumira.” Uye (vanoti) pane mombe dzisingatenderwi kushandiswa, uye nemombe dzavasingatauri zita raAllah pamusoro padzo (pakudziuraya), vachinyepera Allah. Vachavapa mubairo wavo nokuda kweizvo zvavainyepa
